name: pincer

pincer noun
(ANIMAL PART)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C usually plural ] one of a pair of curved claws of an animal such as a crab

pincer noun
(TOOL)
pincers [ plural ]
a tool for holding or pulling something, made of two curved metal bars that move against each other so that when the handles are pushed together the other ends close tightly: The surgeon used two long pincers to control the tools he was using.
